question.direction-text: Select the appropriate sentences from the answer choices that are key points in a discussion of how well various publishers succeeded in creating adless newspapers. Though modernism in art shares certain characteristics, these characteristics can be difficult to define precisely .

intro-text.b: This passage discusses Ben and Jerry's unconventional company.

answer.answer-text: A reflection of the reality of modern life is one aspect of modernism.
There is no universal agreement as to exactly what makes up modern life.
Modernism is a highly individualistic style of art.
Modernism in art must improve upon the style of the mainstream.
There were many different styles of American art in the early twentieth century.
It can be difficult to define what the mainstream is.
